summary: This module defines a class that orchestrates the end‑to‑end workflow for training an Alternating Least Squares (ALS) recommendation model using Google Analytics 4 (GA4) log data stored in BigQuery. It handles service‑account authentication, extracts and preprocesses the raw event data, fits the ALS model, and serialises the trained model for later use.
business_intent: Enable data‑driven personalization by generating a collaborative‑filtering model that can recommend items or content to users based on their interaction history captured in GA4.
